Love Island bombshell Montana Brown looks incredible in seductive lingerie as she poses for a new Halloween collection.

The 24-year-old stripped down to absolutely nothing but her underwear for the raunchy shoot which includes lacy bodysuits and latex-look bralettes.

She's known to have a super fit bod, and it certainly shows in pictures from the new collection as she works up a storm.

In one photo, Montana poses as a sexy cat woman for the autumn Ann Summers campaign.

She donned a revealing lace jumpsuit with sheer panelling and a matching black underwear set underneath, finishing off her innocent look with kitten ears and stiletto heels.

While in another the stunner posed beside another girl as she teased their new underwear.

The Instagram personality wowed in a chic black underwear set with suspenders as she showed off her rock hard abs.

In a third photo, the star wore a sultry all-over lace bodysuit as her blonde curls sat smoothly on her shoulders.

Montana's tiny size six figure came before she entered the Love Island villa.

Before she went on the show, Montana admitted she "wasn't confident" with her size 10 body.

She admitted she never would have gone on the show a year earlier when she was a size 10.

Montana told The Sun : "I wouldn't say I was big, but it's about being confident in yourself and the way you look and I wasn't confident about the way I looked.

(Image: Instagram)

"I definitely wouldn't have gone on Love Island, as in that environment if you do have an insecurity or are not fully confident in yourself it exacerbates it, so I don't think I could have done it."

*Ann Summers' Halloween collection is available in store and online at www.annsummers.com
